snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 441: Sonic Melee 2: The Forbidden Fate (SAGE2008)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Melee 2: The Forbidden Fate - SAGE2008
Credit: Dark Red the Hedgehog
Release Date: August 17th 2008

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00:00 - Intro
00:02:17 - Title
00:02:51 - Cutscene 1
00:06:05 - Green Island Training Brief
00:06:22 - Green Island Zone
00:08:20 - Cutscene 2 & Boss 1
00:10:24 - Cutscene 3
00:15:44 - Emerald City Training
00:16:22 - Freedom Highway Zone Act 1
00:19:22 - Freedom Highway Zone Act 2
00:21:16 - Cutscene 4 Boss 2
00:26:23 - Cutscene 5
00:31:53 - Character Select
00:32:14 - Cutscene 6
00:32:35 - Angel Island Zone A
00:35:24 - Cutscene 7
00:36:31 - Boss 3
00:39:17 - Cutscene 8
00:41:15 - Cutscene 9 & Boss 4
00:43:36 - Cutscene 10
00:47:56 - Marble Garden Zone Path B
00:51:49 - Cutscene 11b & Boss 5b
00:54:29 - Cutscene 12 & End Screen

(Alt Paths)
00:54:39 - Angel Island Zone B & Boss
00:56:22 - Cutscene 8b
00:57:12 - Marble Garden Zone Path A
01:00:59 - Cutscene 11a & Boss 5a
01:03:20 - Cutscene 12 & End Screen

NOTES: AND we are BACK with a SEQUEL to Melee that I did not even know existed!
Starring a ton of new midi music.
New universe characters!
More boss battles and a bunch of story that continues the events of the previous game 3 or so years later!
Venture through busy city streets as you get bombarded by Helicopters!
Figure out whats the deal with this crazy new Emerald!
Figure out different story paths while you probably get yourself killed to invisible death walls and old physics yank!
Only to reach your ultimate goal... A...Cliffhanger! *Applause please, Thanks*
This is... Melee 2! The Forbidden Fate!
So on a serious note, this Sequel is interesting for sure as this time around the text is more readable.
There are "Newish" characters involved and the usual more than one story path to take.
Interesting bosses as well, but there is also a lot of physics yank going on that can make this game more difficult than it actually is.
Highway Zone can also behave almost like a complete progression blocker due to a certain issue it has, it's not impossible tho.
Unfortunately this game will end up in a cliffhanger as it's only a Demo, a pretty long one tho.
I think this game in general went under the radar as it does stand out quite a bit.

(ISSUES)

1. Freeway Highway Zone Act 1 has a very stubborn camera movement issue where it just kills you.
I'm not sure how you get past it side from being lucky that you do.
The goal is to jump onto the Freeway road above the boxes as was seen in the video.

(PASSWORDS)

Available on Site.
